author: Barnini Chakraborty
title: China uses American media to push coronavirus propaganda as war of words continues
description: Another day, another dig. This time it's from a prominent Chinese official who is using articles written by the American media to fuel Beijing's propaganda machine as the tit-for-tat between the two superpowers escalated Monday over COVID-19's origin and whic…
content:
Another day, another dig.
This time it's from a prominent Chinese official who is using articles written by the American media to fuel Beijing's propaganda machine as the tit-for-tat between the two superpowers escalated Monday over COVID-19's origin and whi… [+1723 chars]
